headline: Inverse Cramer Wins Again: Opposite Picks Of Investor Beat Nancy Pelosi In 2025
summary: When it comes to following stock picks of famous individuals, Jim Cramer and Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) are two of the most well-known people. A financial company that allows investors to invest alongside both individuals has crowned a 2025 winner and the answer may be surprising. Jim Cramer Vs. Nancy Pelosi 2025 Stock Picks Battle Former Speaker of the House Pelosi regularly discloses stock trades each year that are made by her husband Paul Pelosi. headline: She Married Into $1M Of Debt And Asked, 'How Do I Not Murder Him?' Dave Ramsey Fires Back Without Sympathy. 'It's Not His Fault'
summary: Leona from Fairbanks, Alaska, called into “The Ramsey Show” to confess she had married a man without ever asking about his financial past. Months into their new life together, she discovered the two of them were nearly $1 million in debt. ‘You Walked In Blindly’ “I’m pretty newly married. Not my first rodeo,” Leona began. She explained that she hadn't done a financial background check on her husband before tying the knot. “We got married in May, and by October, we realized we were close to a mil
